channel.title: Smoking, good or bad?
channel.description:
What do you think? Smoking good or bad? Of course is bad, but lets see what people think.
please use this form [code]What you smoking?: Do you think its bad or good? why do you thinks its good or bad?[/code]

item.title: Smoking, good or bad?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“dragonus18, post:19, topic:133699”]What you smoking?: sage
Do you think its bad or good? idk
why do you thinks its good or bad? its just an herb[/quote]
wtf, who smokes sage? I have like 7 bushes of that in my back yard, you cant really smoke it, you just sniff the smell, though it starts smelling bad after a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Smoking, good or bad?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Tell me your opinion in 30 years.

It will be the same.
Whether I’m still smoking or not is another matter. Moderation in all things.

Read full topic

item.title: Smoking, good or bad?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

goatee:

I dunno why but I’m fine with weed but I know I’m never going to touch tobacco. Way too many reasons.

Pretty much the same for me.

I can smoke pure weed on it’s own fine.

I can smoke weed mixed with tobacco fine.

If I even try to smoke tobacco on it’s own, I feel it in my throat and just need to stop.

Read full topic

item.title: Smoking, good or bad?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I don’t agree that smoking tobacco is bad. It’s called weighing up both sides.

Sure, it has detrimental affects on your health, which is a bad point. However, I enjoy it, which is a good point. For me, the enjoyment outweighs the health risks, currently.

Read full topic

item.title: Smoking, good or bad?

item.description:

Smoking = Kills So = Bad…

Datz Ma Answ0r

item.title: Smoking, good or bad?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:10, topic:133699”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=184956.msg1680565#msg1680565 date=1187332658]

What is the point of this thread. There is nothing to debate. It’s a widely known fact that it is, indeed bad for your health.

Now, is it worth the health effects may be a better topic as there must be something to it. Believe it or not, many people smoke for reasons other then “looking cool.”

I used to smoke a menthol now and then, but ever since I did DXM the second I taste the menthol I feel sick.

i agree on this: weed is better to smoke then ciggerates
[/quote]

Well I’m glad you’ve opened your mind about marijuana, but no smoke is good.

I’ve heard some weird things… One of them being that living in mexico city is like smoking 60 cigs a day. Heard that from a school video. I think I remember hearing on TV once that LA is like a pack a day.[/quote]
I think the reason is this: Its not illegal to grow weed their…so people grow it and smoke it, though smoking it is illegal…but idk.

Read full topic

Now, is it worth the health effects may be a better topic as there must be something to it. Believe it or not, many people smoke for reasons other then “looking cool.”

I used to smoke a menthol now and then, but ever since I did DXM the second I taste the menthol I feel sick.
[/quote]
i agree on this: weed is better to smoke then ciggerates[/quote]

Well I’m glad you’ve opened your mind about marijuana, but no smoke is good.

I’ve heard some weird things… One of them being that living in mexico city is like smoking 60 cigs a day. Heard that from a school video. I think I remember hearing on TV once that LA is like a pack a day.

What is the point of this thread. There is nothing to debate. It’s a widely known fact that it is, indeed bad for your health.

Now, is it worth the health effects may be a better topic as there must be something to it. Believe it or not, many people smoke for reasons other then “looking cool.”

item.title: Smoking, good or bad?
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:4, topic:133699”]For me:

What you smoking? Albuterol (Not sure about spelling)
Do you think its bad or good? No
Why do you thinks its good or bad? My lunges are fucked up enough, theres no need for me to continue to rot myself from the inside. As for the mouth, I would be embarrassed to have such yellow stained teeth and actually kiss someone.[/quote]
ouch, see what i amz sayingz

What you smoking? Albuterol (Not sure about spelling)
Do you think its bad or good? No

item.title: Smoking, good or bad?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Smoking sucks, I would never kiss a girl who smokes, even if she’d be the hottest girl on the earth. Smoking destroys your teeth, lungs and makes your life shorter, just plain bad imo.
